page.title: 11The Control Tower
page.content: The{Control Tower}was completed in 1979. The average number of flights on a busy day is roughly 450. The{Control Tower}itself is shaped like a pyramid with 5 layers or tiers including the Air Traffic control room at the top. The layers consist of:- At the base level, the Tele-communications, (with allthe radar). Next is the Administration with Rest-rooms,Canteen and Emergency sleeping accommodation above. The staff includes 36 operational Controllers with 20 assistants and just over 20 support staff of Tele-communications. The whole staff comes to just under 100. The{Control tower}has been extremely busy since the 1980's and is expected to carry on at this level until 1993.
